title: Patch Notes
content: ile he's in the middle of picking up his backpack could cause him to not teleport beyond the bibberbang field. If this already happened to you, you'll need to talk to him again to make him go to the Myconid Village. He's forgetful, you see. Fixed the goblins from the Goblin Camp sometimes joining combat in the Emerald Grove when they shouldn't. Meli now actually pickpockets Barth.
